title: Victorious Aatrox looks like GARBAGE
body:
https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/promotion/be-victorious-2019-ranked-rewards

This doesn’t even look like there was an attempt made. 
None of it goes together. It looks like a worse version of Justicar Aatrox.


edit: here is a proposed change found on reddit.

https://i.imgur.com/ifqEe72.png

replies.body:
Someone said he looks like he's dressed like Jhin and I can't unsee it.
Not that that's a bad thing, though.

It is true, it looks terrible.
They should rename the skin to **Victorious Atrocious **.

Seriously though, the gold/white colors look like the intern team took the justicar skin and slapped a instagram filter on it. Then they added  blue(?) spandex leggings to him and called it a day before 5pm.
Come on, this is supposed to be the creme de la creme of the skins, something to be proud of.
Even if I played Aatrox, I wouldn't use this skin. I'm 99% sure it can cause eye cancer.
S1 Victorious Jarvan looks better than this......
Victorious jarvan is a recolor and its his best skin >:(
Idk.. warring kingdom j4 is pretty badass

> [{quoted}](name=Fegone,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-10-24T18:21:08.422+0000)
>
> It is true, it looks terrible.
> They should rename the skin to **Victorious Atrocious **.
> 
> Seriously though, the gold/white colors look like the intern team took the justicar skin and slapped a instagram filter on it. Then they added  blue(?) spandex leggings to him and called it a day before 5pm.
> Come on, this is supposed to be the creme de la creme of the skins, something to be proud of.
> Even if I played Aatrox, I wouldn't use this skin. I'm 99% sure it can cause eye cancer.

Aatrocious*.
I'm questioning my hard work this season... for what... this just lowered Victorious bar for skins

> [{quoted}](name=Ravenescence,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-10-24T19:11:12.310+0000)
>
> I'm questioning my hard work this season... for what... this just lowered Victorious bar for skins

You speaking the truth of my mind right now. I climbed to gold, had to go through trolls and dcs, etc. for this..

Yes, technically the actual reward is you got to the rank you are now and you developed new skills, etc. But I at least expect a worthy victorious skin in the end.
Oh look, the first one that arrived complaining XD. Sweet, sweet tears

Now yes OPs post is poorly communicated complaining but there is valid criticism of the skin. It's overly saturated, does overlap with Justicar, and feels a little too proper and put together for Aatrox.
I missed like every season reward cuz I'm a toxic fuck but this is the first time I do not mind
Literally looks like it’s less than a 750 quality skin
I think it looks awesome.

> [{quoted}](name=Iron Phantom,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-24T16:00:19.658+0000)
>
> I think it looks awesome.

Lmao downvoted cuz u literally have a different opinion. Thats sad
Welcome to the boards. You're not allowed to enjoy things that other people hate here.

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-10-24T19:13:16.513+0000)
>
> Welcome to the boards. You're not allowed to enjoy things that other people hate here.

This is so ridiculous. I hate the skin personally I find it low quality and effort but glad someone liked it and this comes from a toxic league player.

> [{quoted}](name=Charmy Bird,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-24T18:57:30.865+0000)
>
> Lmao downvoted cuz u literally have a different opinion. Thats sad

Welcome to boards my friend.
I think it looks bad, but holy crap other opinions are allowed...

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=00000003,timestamp=2019-10-25T20:45:35.247+0000)
>
> I think it looks bad, but holy crap other opinions are allowed...

I respect your opinion :)

> [{quoted}](name=Iron Phantom,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-24T16:00:19.658+0000)
>
> I think it looks awesome.

This is so sad , you literally talked about your opinion and got 40 downvotes wtf

> [{quoted}](name=Ahri Baka,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2019-10-25T14:35:04.298+0000)
>
> This is so sad , you literally talked about your opinion and got 40 downvotes wtf

It's kinda funny actually, that some people are so sad they get their panties in a twist over someone else having a different opinion.

I'll say it again I think the Victorious Aatrox skin looks awesome :)

> [{quoted}](name=Iron Phantom,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2019-10-25T14:59:47.313+0000)
>
> It's kinda funny actually, that some people are so sad they get their panties in a twist over someone else having a different opinion.
> 
> I'll say it again I think the Victorious Aatrox skin looks awesome :)

Look at the bright side , 22 people upvoted you

Not only does it really bad but a lot of people are super disappointed it wasn't Sona. Sona makes way more sense considering how she and Taric literally were the most iconic part of the Spring Split. :/

> [{quoted}](name=OtterlyLost,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2019-10-24T19:17:35.992+0000)
>
> Not only does it really bad but a lot of people are super disappointed it wasn't Sona. Sona makes way more sense considering how she and Taric literally were the most iconic part of the Spring Split. :/

In that case I would've preferred Taric, dude only has like two good skins that actually change his VFX if I remember correctly. If they were a duo give gem boy some love too, he needs something new.
I would agree with Taric too. Taric is fantastic and doesn't get enough love. :/

> [{quoted}](name=OtterlyLost,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2019-10-24T19:44:34.524+0000)
>
> I would agree with Taric too. Taric is fantastic and doesn't get enough love. :/

I don't even play the guy and I feel bad for him.
Right? I love having Taric as a support but he's always nerfed because of proplay and isn't especially popular in soloqueue. :( He's a great champion.
_"From the shattered ruins of your garbage, the Darkin Blade rises"_
Idk, for me, it looks like the mech from the old crappy power rangers tv shows but it is star guardian..

Riot Beardilocks can't stand this skin hate 
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/991e007f65c536c14dce520ed8d668858b12f7804576ff05f8601e24e33e2632.png

He's not wrong though... Why are you so upset about a freaking End of Season skin? You know, the kind of skin you people keep complaining about
EVERY
SINGLE
YEAR

Sadly I have to agree. This skin could definitely use a bit of a rework before being released.
Prestige Blood Moon Aatrox is what they should have done with a character like aatrox -- i mean in terms of its direction by having scary demon/angel thing, just less asian lore, and more purple/gold/platinum fan fare. Currently it just looks like an iteration of justicar that they didn't go with.
Why did they make him look like some sort of star fleet admiral? 
Maybe the chroma is better, maybe the effects look good, but the skin itself at a glance is very unappealing.
Yall it’s fine calm down. I love it tbh
It's just harder to get and worst looking justicar. This skin is actually so disappointing that it makes me wanna drop back down to silver just so that I'm not so disappointed.

> [{quoted}](name=LessCal,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QfpvcUc5,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2019-10-24T22:09:33.085+0000)
>
> It's just harder to get and worst looking justicar. This skin is actually so disappointing that it makes me wanna drop back down to silver just so that I'm not so disappointed.

Yea so, just commented with wrong account xD
Did they re-use the Justicar splash art...?

Wow.  I missed Orianna by a year...

And get this.  Blegh

i like it
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
i hear u, but at the same time they giving it to us free yaknow?
How's it free?
Cause you get it for free if you reach Gold+ in a Ranked Queue?

I swear the reason we got the teaser SOOOO late compared to past victorious award skins was BECAUSE they forgot the season was ending soon and had to rush a skin out. Honestly I'm surprised he got it compared to others like Brand, Sona, Vayne, Yas, Gragas, etc. Aatrox already got the Prestige + normal version of Bloodmoon earlier this year. They should have picked a champ that actually was meta defining and Aatrox just wasn't that and this skin is one of if not THE worst skin he has now. 

It looks like Jhin and old Kayle had a champ mashup and this is the AATROCIOUS baby that resulted from it.

https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/612SP0AQUUL._SX425_.jpg

Find the differences
idk I think it's better justicar aatrox

I look Orianna...then i look this.

{{sticker:sg-janna}}
I think the spell effects are gorgeous, but the model is severely lacking.
The aesthetics of his dressup is so bad that i cant even compare him to pre VU {{champion:48}}
Looks a bit like a rule 63 Kayle.
I don't see it as a worse version of justicar, But it is definitely very not good looking
They should have used more sapphire blue like last years orianna
